Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 1 Tika, Hetuduka » 1.21 Ajjhattārammaṇattika, Hetuduka » 1.21.1 Hetupada » 1.21.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Tika, Hetuduka
Ajjhattārammaṇattika, Hetuduka
Hetupada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
233.
880Ajjhattārammaṇo hetu dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
881Bahiddhārammaṇo hetu dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
882Ajjhattārammaṇo hetu dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ajjhattārammaṇo hetu dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)
883Bahiddhārammaṇo hetu dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhārammaṇo hetu dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
234.
884Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, vipāke indriye magge sampayutte dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
885Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
886Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
887Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
888(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
